GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.34 to before v4.19.254
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_thin_linear_timeouts.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.254 by commit f4b0295be9a3c4260de4585fac4062e602a88ac7, it was introduced in version v2.6.34 by commit 36e31b0af58728071e8023cf8e20c5166b700717. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_thin_linear_timeouts.
